thread.section_title: DoYouSpain.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre DoYouSpain.com | doyouspain.com | 11 de 485
thread.title: George

author: George
title: George
text:
When we hire at Alicante airport we always book with do you Spain. Their prices are always the best.
When you book it's a good idea to check which company you are getting the car from. We would not choose Firefly who seem to be an offshoot of Hertz. We would always recommend taking the full insurance it's not cheap but it takes all the hassle out of your hire. It also means they don't put a huge block on your card in event of a dispute. The other bonus at the end of the hire you just hand in the paperwork no waiting for an inspection of the car.
